mapper.select: SELECT member_id, member_name, member_email, regi_date, modi_date, del_yn FROM member WHERE del_yn='N' ORDER BY member_id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_email, regi_date) VALUES (#{member_id}, #{member_pw}, #{member_name}, #{member_email}, now())
INSERT INTO member_role (member_id, member_roles, regi_id, regi_name, regi_date) VALUES (#{member_id}, #{member_roles}, #{regi_id}, #{regi_name}, now())
